name: Vikranth Rona
info: When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.

name: Arjun Reddy
info: A short-tempered yet brilliant young medical surgeon immerses himself in drugs and alcohol when his lady- love is forced to marry someone else.

name: Chhichhore
info: Divided by time, united by a tragic incident. In a bittersweet reunion, seven middle-aged friends take a walk down the memory lane at the least expected...

name: Veerasimha Reddy
info: Jai's reunion with his long-lost influential father Veera gets chaotic when the latter's past returns to haunt him. How will Jai save Veera from his ill-fate?

name: Dil Dechara
info: Brought together by a tragic twist, Kizie and Manny embark on a bittersweet journey into the heart of that crazy little thing called 'life'.

name: Avatar The Way Of Water
info: Set more than a decade after the first film, dive into the story of the Sully family; the lengths they go to keep each other safe and the tragedies they endure.

name: Super 30
info: Based on the life of ace mathematician Anand Kumar, who trained 30 underprivileged students to crack one of the toughest entrance exams in India - IIT.

name: Ms.Dhoni
info: A tell-all tale about the life and times of Indian cricketer Mahendra Singh Dhoni, mapping his journey from a ticket collector to a celebrated sportsman.

name: Neeraj
info: When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.

name: Gour Hari Dastaan
info: When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.

name: Aag Se Khelenge
info: The film chronicles the life of MLA Vangaveeti Mohana Ranga from Vijayawada, who rose to power after his brother's murder and was assassinated in his prime.

name: Avengers Endgame
info: After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
info: Set more than a decade after the first film, dive into the story of the Sully family; the lengths they go to keep each other safe and the tragedies they endure.

name: Bahubali 2
info: Why did Kattappa kill Amarendra Baahubali? Unveil the mystery and many more secrets that lie in the depths of the Mahishmati kingdom.

name: Venom
info: Set more than a decade after the first film, dive into the story of the Sully family; the lengths they go to keep each other safe and the tragedies they endure.

name: Big Boss
info: It's time for real entertainment with Nagarjuna, in a whirlwind of unexpected twists, conflicts and surprises. This season, everything will be 'ulta pulta'!

name: Adhivaram with star maa parivar
info: Hosted by Sreemukhi, get ready for non-stop entertainment as your favourite Maa families play musical games and challenge each other for cash..

name: Sixth Sense
info: Guess it right to win it all! Everyone's favourite host Ohmkar is back with a brand new season of challenging mind games. Are you ready?

name: Radha Krishna
info: Radha's love for Lord Krishna knows no bounds. Their eternal love has stood the test of time. Here's a soulful re-telling of this supreme tale of romance and sacrifice.

name: Mahabharatham
info: Watch the rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminate in the Kurukshetra war in Mahabharatham, driven by the razor-sharp strategies of Krishna, the...

name: Dear Ishq
info: Famous author Abhimanyu gets swept up in a cutthroat challenge with Asmita, for whom life is beyond paperback fiction. In the face of rivalry, will love bloom?

name: Dance Plus
info: Remo is back with a bang to hunt for the next dance icon with host Raghav, and captains Punit, Shakti and Salman. The biggest dance battle of the year is here!

name: Anupuma
info: TODAY'S EP IS DELAYED. Despite the many challenges thrown her way, Anupama begins a new chapter of her life post-divorce. Head held always high, what's waitin...

name: Mangalyan
info: PM Modi and ISRO scientists celebrate the landmark success of Managlyaan's entry into the orbit of Mars.

name: Mickey Mouse
info: Mickey and gang must stop hundreds of old film reel versions of Mickey from wreaking havoc all over town.

name: NED vs AFG
info: Netherlands take on Afghanistan in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 match at Lucknow and here's everything you need to know

name: IND vs SL
info: The Men In Blue secured a semi-final berth in some style as they ran through Sri Lanka by a whopping 302-runs in ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023

name: ENG vs AUS
info: England take on Australia in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 match at Ahmedabad and here's everything you needÂ to know

name: NZ vs PAK
info: New Zealand take on Pakistan in the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 match at Bengaluru and here's everything you need to know

name: NZ vs SA
info: South Africa piled on yet another 350+ score before the bowlers delivered a 190-run win to upstage New Zealand in ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023

name: Tottenham vs Chelsea
info: Tottenham host Chelsea in Gameweek 11 of Premier League 2023/24 and these are the best moments from this heated rivalry

name: Diamondbacks
info: Watch highlights of the fifth game between Arizona Diamondbacks and Texas Rangers in the MLB World Series 2023

name: Atrangi Re
info: Runaway Rinku gets forcefully married to an already engaged Vishu. The love triangle gets weirder when Rinku's lover Sajjad shows up.

name: Akhanda
info: Murali Krishna is a protector of his village. When he falls into Varadarajulu's trap, Akhanda arrives with the blessings of Lord Shiva and becomes their saviour.

name: Skanda
info: A headstrong Ram challenges the two influential CMs for a personal vendetta. Will this daring move bring about the reckoning he seeks?

name: Indiana Jones
info: When a series of mysterious events stirs pandemonium in a village, an eccentric cop Vikrant Rona sets out to solve the case wherein everyone is under the radar.

name: RRR
info: Under the British Raj, two revolutionaries with personal agendas forge a friendship, only to find each other on opposing sides.

name: Legend Hanuman
info: Hanuman has realised his limitless powers, and now he must journey alone to Lanka to face the night the demon king Ravan, his fierce sons and his armies

name: Hara Hara Mahadev
info: He is the supreme being and the destroyer of evil. Witness lord Shiva's story, his avatars, and a union that shaped the universe - his marriage to Parvati.

name: Murugan
info: Does the birth story of Lord Murugan intrigue you? Discover interesting known and unknown tales around Lord Murugan in this series.

name: Janaki Ramudu
info: Janaki Ramudu is the classic epic of Ramayana retold through the eyes of the righteous, beautiful and brave Janaki and her immense love for Rama!

name: Loki
info: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of 'Avengers: Endgame.'

name: Thor
info: The God of Thunder teams up with King Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend-turned-Mighty-Thor Jane Foster to take on a galactic killer known as Gorr the God Butcher.

name: Antman
info: Cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner-hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

name: Black Panther
info: T'Challa, heir to the hidden kingdom of Wakanda, must lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

name: Shang Chi
info: Shang-Chi, a martial arts master, must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

name: Cadaver
info: A high-profile murder baffles the cops when a prison inmate claims responsibility and promises more deaths. Will police surgeon Bhadra crack this mystery?

name: Raid
info: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

name: Good Luck Jerry
info: In dire need of money, Jerry gets drawn into the dangerous world of drug trafficking. Things go awry when she decides to quit.

name: Vikram Vedha
info: When an attempt is made on the life of a reigning gangster, his three sons take it upon themselves to hunt the culprit, all amid a succession battle.

name: Mastero
info: A 'blind' pianist lands in hot water when he witnesses a crime during a private concert. Trapped in a catch-22 situation, Arun is in for an unpleasant ride.

name: Bramhamudi
info: The lives of Kavya and her sisters change forever as they cross paths with the Duggiraala brothers. As fate brings them closer, what's in store for them?

name: Rain or Shine
info: Shang-Chi, a martial arts master, must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

name: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
info: Crown Prince Yuvraj Vijay Singh and his doppelganger, a carefree stage actor, Prem Dilwale's lives get entangled in a royal battle of romance and deceit.

name: Hero
info: A gangster's son kidnaps the daughter of the Chief of Police, as her father has some crucial evidence. While the police chase the two, love blooms between them.
Chronicling the historic 1983 Cricket World Cup, thirteen underdogs led by Kapil Dev fight and win against all odds to put India on the map.

name: Sanju
info: A heart-warming, real-life story of actor Sanjay Dutt's complicated relationships, his addictions and his endearing approach towards living life 'Dutt' size.

name: Ford v Ferrari
info: Caroll Shelby and Ken Miles battle against all the odds to build a race car for Ford Motor Company and take on the dominant Ferraris at the Le Mans in 1966.

name: OBI-VAN KENOBI
info: During the reign of the Empire, Obi-Wan Kenobi embarks on a crucial mission.

name: THE MAZE RUNNER
info: Thomas wakes up in an elevator and finds himself in a strange world of young boys who are trying to escape through the Maze that surrounds their living space.

name: DEVS
info: A young software engineer, Lily Chan, investigates the secretive development division of her employer, which she believes is behind the murder of her boyfriend.

name: THE MARTIN
info: Mark Watney is presumed dead and is left behind on planet Mars. NASA discovers that he is alive and commissions a mission to rescue him.

name: TERMINATOR
info: Dani Ramos joins forces with Grace, a futuristic soldier, and Sarah Connor to fight against a highly advanced Terminator, a Rev-9.

name: AAKHRI SACH.
info: A bone-chilling tale that unravels the twisted ties of fate, trapped secrets of a family and the most terrifying horrors an investigator has ever seen.

name: MONSTER
info: Trying to cope with the hardships, Bhamini and Anil's life turns catastrophic as Lucky Singh invades. Secrets unveil when this uninvited guest starts his game

name: JUNGLE CRUISE
info: A rollicking thrill-ride down the Amazon with wisecracking skipper Frank Wolff and intrepid researcher Dr. Lily Houghton.

name: PIRATES OF THE CIRIBBEAN
info: When Captain Barbossa kidnaps the Governer's daughter and her would-be suitor, Will Turner, coerces Captain Jack Sparrow into rescuing her.

name: THE JUNGLE BOOK
info: When a tiger named Shere Khan threatens to kill Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves, his friends Bagheera and Baloo help him escape his clutches.

name: BRAHMASTRA
info: A journey of fantasy, action and romance comes to life as Shiva enters the Astraverse! He discovers true love and also, the power of fire within him.

name: Bala
info: Balmukund Shukla's pride lies in his hair, but premature baldness robs him of more than just his looks. With love at stake, will he have a 'hairy'-tale ending?

name: MY3
info: A rich entrepreneur struggling with an allergy to human touch finds a solution in a robot. But when it crashes before delivery, a 'real' replacement is sent.

name: GOOD NIGHT
info: A chance meeting brings a diffident Mohan and Anu together. When his snoring wreaks havoc on their marital life, can the couple find a solution?

name: GATTA KUSTHI
info: A chance meeting brings a diffident Mohan and Anu together. When his snoring wreaks havoc on their marital life, can the couple find a solution?

name: PRINCE
info: A comedy of errors ensues when Anbu falls for his British colleague Jessica. Cultural differences aside, there is a lot more to settle for this couple to unite

name: FREE GUY
info: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

name: DOREMON
info: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he's got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

name: SHIN CHAN
info: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

name: FROZEN
info: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

name: CARS
info: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.

name: AVENGERS ASSEMBLE
info: Guy, a bank teller, discovers he is a background player in an open-world video game and decides to become the hero of his own story.
